Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3701_10.jpg'}
{3: "Confusion is evident in the girl's eyes as she walks through a desolate land. The ground is strewn with dust and sand, and weathered gravestones stand erect, scattered across the surface."}
{3: 'The human, whom she calls the "Curse Queller", has made their final choice.'}
{3: 'The presence of the human has vanished, and the world that was created for that individual no longer has a purpose to exist.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Why give up at the moment right before getting everything?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Such an ending is not anticipated by anyone.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She whispers the question over and over, but the answer she longs for will forever elude her.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: '...In the end, "I" still couldn\'t understand anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'But one thing remains certain—"humans" are a species that the more you study them, the more unfathomable they become.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gazes upon this world teetering on the brink of its inevitable demise, silently awaiting her own ending.'}
{3: 'However, a moment later, a faint smile graces her face.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Not understanding anything doesn't mean this is a meaningless journey.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/Rougae/UimovieRouge01/UimovieRouge01.prefab'}
{3: 'She spreads out her skirt, gracefully lowering herself to the ground, knees bent and eyes closed.'}
{3: 'She bows her head to the numerous gravestones.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Thank you, for the time we spent together.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'For surpassing my expectations and continuously surprising me until the very end.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I will hold every decision you've made close to my heart."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I will cherish... no, make the most of everything I've gained from you."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'For calming the sound of tide on the planet, for that lives can bear greater fruits.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'For the next time... when "our"" path and ""yours" cross again.'}
{3: 'With a heart filled with gratitude, she humbly pays her respects to the human across space.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Oh... by the way.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Please allow me to bid you farewell one last time on behalf of "myself."'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'You... and "all of you," have created a...'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'A fascinating story.'}
{3: 'Later—'}
{3: "A gentle breeze caresses the girl's hair, causing it to dance in the air."}
{3: 'And dispersing this ephemeral dream that only exists in fleeting moments.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The examination on this area should be completed, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The concentration of the remaining Punishing Virus has fallen below the safety threshold. It's confirmed that the Red Tide in this area has been out.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Good work, guys.', 3: '55'}
{2: "It's rare to see a Red Tide subside on its own.", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Indeed, no signs of Corrupted or Hetero-Creatures have been detected, which is quite unusual. But for the time being, I guess we can mark the area as "safe."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Other teams will be dispatched to conduct a more detailed examination. We're just here to scout.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have we found anything?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Speaking of that... Liv found this in an abandoned building. Probably belonged to a Scavenger.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee hands you a well-worn camping backpack, where you only find a journal with its cover yellowed, a pen out of ink, and some rolls of moldy bandages remaining inside.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I tried to scan for any signs of life nearby, but unfortunately... its owner may have...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'As you scan through the journal left by the unidentified Scavenger, you answer Liv with a nod of acknowledgment, indicating that she need not finish her sentence.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This place was flooded by a high-concentration Red Tide not long ago. The chances of human survival were almost negligible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But at least this person left something behind.', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's written in the journal?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Having reached the conclusion of the journal, you gently close its worn pages.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'A story? What kind of story?', 4: '1'}
{2: "...It's a bit complicated, hard to explain in a few words.", 3: '72'}
{2: "If you're interested, I'll ask WGAA to make some copies.", 3: '73'}
{2: "The mission is finished. Let's head back.", 3: '74'}
{3: 'With utmost care, you return the journal to its rightful place and put on the backpack that once belonged to a stranger before leaving with your squad.'}
{3: 'It is a story woven by the whims of an ordinary being who traversed through this desolate world.'}
{3: 'The story, perhaps not captivating, may not be worthy of being read, analyzed, or praised.'}
{3: 'But any story crafted with sincerity will always find its own "readers."'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{2: '???', 3: "In □ case, □□□'s wish... □□fulfilled□...?"}
{3: 'In the distance, a lingering voice echoes, unheard by any ear.'}
